body.p: The Gentoo forums have passed another historic mark, several important pieces of documentation have been made even better than they were, and the Greek translator team is recruiting helpers -- this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter features a German developer, tells about a strictly Gentoo-esque distribution release from Argentina, yet another series of convivial nights on the town of Tokyo, and has all the usual reports from the developer mailing list, Bugzilla statistics (covering two weeks, due to a scheduled downtime of the editor and a number of unfortunate misunderstandings on the team last week), press clippings, new developers and security announcements. With an apology for the GWN-less week before, here's your regular newsletter again: Enjoy!
